name: Zhuqiaomon
effect: [When Digivolving] Your opponent chooses 1 of their Digimon. Delete all Digimon other than this Digimon and your opponent's chosen Digimon. For each Digimon deleted by this effect, gain 1 memory.[Your Turn] When an opponent's Digimon is deleted, this Digimon gains ＜Security Attack +1＞ for the turn for each of your opponent's Digimon deleted.
